description.value:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wdmUH6hdat7jpEWt]{Beastmaster Dedication}

All of your animal companions grow up, becoming mature animal companions and gaining additional capabilities (Core Rulebook 214). During an encounter, even if you donâ€™t use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command an Animal} action, your animal companion can still use 1 action on your turn to either @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Stride} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike}.
